testcase.name: Verify Login With Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is opening website...........................................passed When the user enters valid credentials and clicks on login button...........passed Then verify if the user is on home page.....................................passed

testcase.name: Verify Login With blank Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is opening website...........................................passed When the user enters blank credentials and clicks on login button...........passed Then verify if error message is displayed...................................passed
